G

Game - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine
The heart of all NmEngine games, this handles the window and state, this class should be instanced to create a game.
Game(int, int, String, State, int, double, Color) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates a new Game class, it is advised you only create one of these, else weird things happen.
Game(int, int, String, State, int, Color) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates a new Game class, it is advised you only create one of these, else weird things happen.
Game(int, int, String, State, int) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates a new Game class, it is advised you only create one of these, else weird things happen.
Game(int, int, String, State) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates a new game with specified width, height, title, and state, the background color is white
Game(String, State) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates a 400x300px window with the specified state and title
Game(int, int, String) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates game window of specified width, height and title.
Game(int, int) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates game window of specified width and height.
Game() - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Creates empty game window of a blank state
GameObject - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine.entity
Game object class, skeleton for the sprite class that handles motion and dimension
GameObject() - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
Basic object class that handles sprite movement
GameObject(double, double) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
Basic object class that handles sprite movement
GameObject(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
Basic object class that handles sprite movement
GameObject(Rectangle) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
Basic object class that handles sprite movement
GameThread - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine.core
Contains Update and Graphics loop
GameThread() - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.core.GameThread
 
getCenter() - Method in class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
Gets Center of object as Point2D
getKeyJustPressed(int) - Static method in class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Returns true if key was just pressed.
getKeyPressed(int) - Static method in class me.nimnon.nmengine.Game
Returns true if key is pressed down.
Group - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine.entity
